body.p: Bugday, the amazing initiative for user contribution to Gentoo, has teamed up with several sponsors to offer you the chance to win one of many interesting prizes and give-aways when we celebrate Bugday's 3-year anniversary this coming weekend. What do you have to do to be in with a chance of winning? Show up in #gentoo-bugs on irc.freenode.net Saturday 5th of August, squash some bugs, have fun, contribute and learn! We'll keep going for as long as we can call it saturday in any part of the world. Prizes will include head-turning Gentoo-wear, books, gadgets, and a few surprises yet to be announced, as well as the chance to wim your very own Gentoo penguin!

When it started out life as GLEP 6 three years ago there was little doubt that the project was one with great potential to benefit Gentoo and strengthen the bond with our user community. We are proud to a community driven distro and Bugday has proven to be a great recruitment tool, an excellent way to get feedback from users and, of course, it has been invaluable as users come along and help work on our open bugs.
To celebrate, we will run a number of contests this coming saturday. You can battle other users for the most solved bugs, most Gentoo specific knowledge, and other competitions.
Keep an eye on this week's GWN and on the Bugday website as it is updated with information! We'll be looking forward to seeing you in #gentoo-bugs on the 5th.
